name: ListWorkflowRunJobs
description:
Retrieve jobs from a specific GitHub workflow run attempt.

This tool retrieves jobs for a specific workflow run attempt on GitHub. It is useful for users who need to monitor or analyze job details of a workflow run. Access to the repository is required, and permissions depend on whether the repository is public or private.

parameters.name: repository_owner
parameters.description: The account owner of the repository, not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: repository_name
parameters.description: The name of the GitHub repository to fetch jobs from. This is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: workflow_run_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the workflow run to list jobs for.

value_schema.description: The unique identifier of the workflow run.

parameters.name: workflow_run_attempt_number
parameters.description: The attempt number of the specific workflow run to retrieve jobs for. This is typically used to distinguish between multiple attempts of the same run.

value_schema.description: The attempt number of the workflow run.

parameters.name: results_per_page
parameters.description: Specifies the number of job results to return per page, with a maximum of 100.

value_schema.description: The number of results per page (max 100).

parameters.name: results_page_number
parameters.description: Specify the page number of the results to fetch, used for pagination.

value_schema.description: Page number of the results to fetch.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the GitHub API.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: The number of results per page (max 100).

value_schema.description: The number of results per page (max 100).

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number of the results to fetch.

value_schema.description: Page number of the results to fetch.

parameters.name: owner
parameters.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: repo
parameters.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: run_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the workflow run.

value_schema.description: The unique identifier of the workflow run.

parameters.name: attempt_number
parameters.description: The attempt number of the workflow run.

value_schema.description: The attempt number of the workflow run.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
